attributes.action: advise the The Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) that Google Street View is good for the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to the ICO and other Government bodies in the UK that may be considering that Google Street view should be stopped or suspended. Google Street View, in our opinion, is NOT an invasion of privacy, but is in fact of great benefit to the population of the UK. 

We strongly believe that Google are taking a very responsible attitude to privacy concerns in the way that they are dealing with a very small minority of complaints, which don't, in any way, reflect the enjoyment and usefulness that the program provides to many thousands of happy and satisfied users. Don't give the scaremongers their way !
